name: surface
description: A tiny middleware of RESTful API for koa.

scripts.test-cov: NODE_ENV=test node --harmony-generators node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -u exports --require should test/* --bail
scripts.test-travis: NODE_ENV=test node --harmony-generators node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -u exports --require should test/* --bail

author: zedgu
